# Class ProcessContextImpl

Provides access to execution context information for custom nodes.

##### Index

### Methods

getConfig getDatastore getExecutionConfig getExecutionId getExternal getVariant isCancelled

## Methods

### getConfig

  * getConfig(): any

Gets the configuration helper from the context.

#### Returns any

The configuration object

Implementation of ProcessContext.getConfig




### getDatastore

  * getDatastore(): [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)

Gets the datastore for the execution.

#### Returns [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)

The datastore

Implementation of ProcessContext.getDatastore




### getExecutionConfig

  * getExecutionConfig(): ExecutionConfig

Gets the execution configuration from the context.

#### Returns ExecutionConfig

The execution configuration




### getExecutionId

  * getExecutionId(): string

Gets the execution ID from the context.

#### Returns string

The execution ID




### getExternal

  * getExternal(): any

Gets the external reference for C++ interop.

#### Returns any

The external reference




### getVariant

  * getVariant(): string

Gets the variant string from the context.

#### Returns string

The variant string




### isCancelled

  * isCancelled(): boolean

Checks if the execution has been cancelled.

#### Returns boolean

True if cancelled, false otherwise
